divs: sighting detailswhile driving south at about 11pm i saw a large white light low in the sky ahead. i could sense rather than see the enormity of the object, it was huge! about 1\2 mile later i stopped my car and took a pic with my camera phone shich was the only camera available. the full moon reflected off the object at times and i could almost see the shape of the objct. i travelled south for 30 minutes where i reached the interatate and continued south. at this time the light was more visible and a smaller light was also seen near the large light. the lights began to move up and down opposite each other as nif they were dancing. this activity lasted more than one minute. when i arrived at my destination a friend came outside and was also able to see the bright light. the sky in the distance hsd a pink glow and looked cloudy. it became difficult to see the object. i snapped pics with camera phone at that time as well the object made no sound that i could hear
Summary: Driving south huge light noted in front of me low in sky. I stopped car &took pic with camera fone.
